name: TVCollectionViewFullScreenLayoutAttributes
desc: Attributes to manage the appearance of the collection view's layout.

items.name: var contentBleed: UIEdgeInsets
items.desc: The amount of content that bleeds into the masked portions of the cell.

items.name: var cornerRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The radius to use when drawing rounded corners for the cell.

items.name: var maskAmount: CGFloat
items.desc: The amount of masking to apply to the cell.

items.name: var parallaxOffset: CGFloat
items.desc: The number of points by which to shift the background from the center when moving focus.

items.name: var normalizedPosition: CGFloat
items.desc: A value that indicates the distance of the current cell from the collection view's center cell.
